name: Devils Cry (Maybe)
description:
Devil May Cry inspired NES retro game developed in one week for the Retro Jam 2021.

Controls: (Controller also works)
WASD - Move
Space - Jump
LMB - Melee Attack
RMB - Ranged Attack
Return - Start

First game jam I attended. Also first time using Unity and doing pixel art (as you can probably tell :P). Everything has been done by me alone in the timeframe of the jam, except for Fonts and Audio.

The theme "side effects" has not been used.

Other credits:
Alagard font by Hewett Tsoi.
Background music used with permission by Neothunderx https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChQrkBDYql3k_NDTishnZDg
